item.description:
I'm unable to change my schedule at work yet, so I need to change the monthly meetup to Thursday. The Skellig was a big success this month and everyone was happy with the new venue, so we're keeping it there.The appetizers are more traditional than Margaritas, the menu is a typical pub-style, and the drinks cost less. It's a very relaxed atmosphere with large tables for our group. It's also closer to the parking lot, just around the corner. So, The Skellig it is! I hope you'll all join us there!

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Skellig Monthly Meetup
